Content: A group of people of the association to protect ETI depositors staged a protest requesting the President to intervene to recover monies of the ETI depositors. A walk took place from Maradana Technical Junction to Fort Railway station. Thereafter the participants staged a protest in front of the Railway Station. They said that the President had obstacles during the time of the previous government to stand in support of them. They said that there was no result although the previous government was informed about their situation.
